pixelmon.interaction.bottlecap.level: %s must be level %i before using this!
jei.pixeltweaks.drops.title: Pokemon Drops
jei.pixeltweaks.pokeloot.title: Poke Loot Chest
jei.pixeltweaks.infuser.title: Infuser Recipes
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.catch_pokemon.po:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.catch_pokemon.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.p:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.w:
Default: Wild and non wild pokemon are counted
True: Only wild pokemon
False: Only non wild pokemon
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.i: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_trainer.g:
Default: Affects all trainers
True: Only gym leaders
False: Only non gym leaders
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_player.us: Optional. The name of the player to match against.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_player.uu: Optional. The UUID of the player to match against.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.hatch_egg.pokemo:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.hatch_egg.invert: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.trade_pokemon.po:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.evolve_pokemon.p:
The pokemon spec to match. In this case, the pokemon being evolved INTO.
So Ivysaur & Venasaur are fine, but not Bulbasaur.

Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.evolve_pokemon.i: The item that was used to evolve the pokemon. Only applicable for item interaction evolution.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.f: The filter to use for the pokedex. Leaving to ALL will count all pokemon in the pokedex.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.c:
True: Only count caught pokemon
False: Count seen and caught pokemon
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.t: The type of pokemon to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to TYPE.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.g: The minimum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.
The maximum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.a:
True: Allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
False: Do not allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_percenta: The percentage of the pokedex that must be completed. 50% is 50.0, not 0.5
The filter to use for the pokedex. Leaving to ALL will count all pokemon in the pokedex.

True: Only count caught pokemon
False: Count seen and caught pokemon
The type of pokemon to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to TYPE.
The minimum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.
The maximum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.

True: Allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
False: Do not allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedollars.amou: The amount of pokedollars to collect.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedollars.cons:
True: Will consume the pokedollars on turn in
False: Will not consume the pokedollars on turn in
Default: Will obey the chapter setting
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.level_pokemon.po:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.level_pokemon.ca: The cause of the level up. Can be any, curry, rare candy, etc.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.level_pokemon.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.atta: Optional. The move to use, in full lowercase english with underscores instead of spaces. If blank, will match any move.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.poke:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.inve: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.crit:
Default: Will trigger regardless of crit
True: Will only trigger on a critical hit
False: Will only trigger on a non-critical hit
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.item: The type of item to match.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.cust: The custom item to match. Only applicable if the item type is CUSTOM.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.poke:
The pokemon the item is used on. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.inve: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification

ftbquests.task.pixelmon.take_photo.ignor: Whether to ignore boss pokemon. If true, the task will ignore photos of boss pokemon

ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.title: %s Chest Drop
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.loot_: The loot tier of the chest. Higher tiers have better loot.
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.play_:
True: Will play the PokeLoot sound effect
False: Will not play nothing
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.toolt: Will drop a random item from a %s Chest when claimed
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokedollars.to: The amount of Pokedollars to give.
